Data: Bracken to Kallis, 1 run fullish, outside off stump, again Kallis is early into his off drive on this sluggish slow track and the ball runs off the inner edge to backward square leg
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run the slower one, rolling his cutters across, worked to square leg

Bracken to Kallis, no run comes down the track and goes for the big drive straight down the ground but finds the sticks at the other end. FWIW, Gibbs was outside his crease as well but Bracken didn't get any hand on that.
Bracken to Kallis, no run leans forward to drive to cover
Bracken to Kallis, FOUR runs shuffles right across the stumps, ends up outside off stump, Bracken pushed it outside off and Kallis drives superbly past the bowler and to the boundary
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run moves across the sticks again, Bracken pushes it even wider outside off, Kallis reaches out to run it down to third man
Geeves to Kallis, no run on the middle and off line, on a length, leans forward to defend to the off side
Geeves to Kallis, no run takes couple of steps down the track, stays adjacent to the line of a short-of-length delivery on the off and middle, and punches it forcefully but can't beat cover
Geeves to Kallis, 1 run dabs this down to third man for a single.
Geeves to Gibbs, 1 run short in length, around off stump, pushed very close on the off side and they rush across for a single

Geeves to Kallis, FOUR runs Kallis is rocking. He has decided that he is going to be aggressive today. Again, couple of steps down the pitch, again stays adjacent to the line and punches the back-of-length delivery through cover point

Geeves to Kallis, (no ball) Full and around the leg stump, Kallis tries to flick it away and the tv comms reckon it went off the pad and Haddin 'catches' it. I thought it went off the bat face, actually. Let me see if there is a replay. Anyway, free hit coming up.
Geeves to Kallis, no run tries to force another one through the off side but can't find the gap
Bracken to Gibbs, no run Haddin is standing up to the stump and hops to collect this. Gibbs was trying to run it down through the vacant slip region but doesn't connect

Bracken to Gibbs, no run Now we have a slip in place. Gibbs was trying to paddle sweep but pulls out of the shot as Bracken pushes it outside off stump and Haddin gathers the chest-high delivery pretty well
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run full delivery, on the middle stump line, turned to square leg region
Bracken to Kallis, no run yet another slower delivery , on the off stump line, driven straight to cover
Bracken to Kallis, no run full pitched outside off stump, square driven to point
Bracken to Kallis, no run full pitched on the middle stump line, pushed down to mid-on
Geeves to Gibbs, no run length delivery around the off stump line, defended to the off side
Geeves to Gibbs, no run comes down the pitch, Geeves drags back the length and keeps it outside off, pushed to cover
Geeves to Gibbs, 1 run allows the back-of-length delivery to come in to him and wrists it away past square leg

Geeves to Kallis, 1 run again goes for the big drive, Ponting moves swiftly to his left at mid-off and not only makes a diving stop but also gets up so quickly that he fires in a throw at the striker's end. What a fine fielder.
Geeves to Gibbs, no run around the off stump line, pushed to the off side
Geeves to Gibbs, no run short in length ,just outside off stump, guided to backward point
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run pushed across Kallis who goes back to run it down to third man. The keeper is standing up. A very good crowd in and they cheer the fifty

Bracken to Gibbs, OUT Gibbs loses patience with the sluggish track and finds the deep midwicket fielder. He went down on his back knee to swing the slower one but found more elevation than distance. Hopes runs forward and gets under the ball.
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run lands around the leg stump, moves in towards middle, worked to wide midwicket region for a single
Bracken to de Villiers, no run slanted across AB, who tries to run it down to third man but sends it straight, along the ground, to wide sole slip in place
Bracken to de Villiers, no run full in length, angled across, cut down to point

Bracken to de Villiers, no run another one of those cutters, the off cutter this time, goes past the forward prod and Haddin collects. Bracken, as ever, is bowling quite a few off cutters. And it's perfect for this slow track
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run floated full outside off stump, driven to deep cover.
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run leans forward to turn it to the on side
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run turns in from outside off, AB lunges across and is hit on the pad, trying to defend.
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run lands it full outside off, flicked to backward square leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run leans across to flick through midwicket to the man at the deep
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run spins in from outside off stump, dabbed through cover point for a single
Bracken to Kallis, FOUR runs full in length, width outside off stump and Kallis crashes it through cover point. The bat completes the full arc as the ball races away through the packed off-side field
Bracken to Kallis, no run leans forward to drive another slow delivery to mid-off
Bracken to Kallis, no run the slip comes out and we have a sweeper cover in place now. Kallis tries to run down a well-outside-off delivery but can't connect.
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run Bracken continues with his off cutters . This one is around 116 kmph, full delivery slanted across Kallis who dabs it down to third man
Bracken to de Villiers, no run around 116 k again, slightly short in length, cut to point
Bracken to de Villiers, no run 112.1 k. almost an off break and AB pushes inside the line as the ball goes through to Haddin, standing up to the stumps.
Hauritz to Kallis, no run stretches across to push to extra cover
Hauritz to Kallis, no run turning in from outside off, defended to the off side
Hauritz to Kallis, no run shuffles across, flicks the full delivery from outside off to backward square leg
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run floated well outside off stump, Kallis stretches across to cover drive it to sweeper cover
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run moves across to sweep from outside-off to long-leg for a single.
Hauritz to Kallis, no run drifted outside off, pushed to cover. 61 for 2 in 18 overs.
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run short in length, outside off, AB moves forward and across to short-arm pull it to deep backward square leg
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run punches through the off side to sweeper cover for a run
Hopes to de Villiers, no run full in length, just outside off stump, AB bends his knees and punches it away to point

Hopes to de Villiers, no run slightly short in length, just outside off, wristed to midwicket, where Ponting fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but misses. Had he hit, it would have got really interesting. Ponting holds his head
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run pushed through the off side for a single
Hopes to Kallis, 2 runs full pitched outside off, Kallis crashes it hard through the off side but the sweeper cover gets across to cut it off
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run gets across, outside off and flicks it to midwicket
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run again turned from outside off to the on side
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run leans across to defend
Hauritz to de Villiers, FOUR runs drops it short and AB latches on to it, gets across the stumps and pulls it to deep square leg boundary
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run stretches across to sweep but slips! the ball runs away to backward square leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run shuffles right across, exposing all the three sticks,, and flicks a full delivery from outside off to backward square leg
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run on a length, straightening around the middle and leg line, clipped past square leg
Hopes to de Villiers, 2 runs threatens to move outside leg before moving towards off stump, Hopes keeps it outside off and is run down to left of third man
Hopes to de Villiers, no run Haddin stands up to the stumps. Full in length, on the middle, deflected to midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run on the off stump line, chopped away through cover point for a single
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run stands tall to drive to sweeper cover
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run just outside off stump, from back of length, run down to third man
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run moves outside off again and works it to right of midwicket for a single
Hauritz to Kallis, FOUR runs floated full outside off stump, Kallis goes for the big off drive and edges it through the vacant slip region
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run goes back, waits for the ball to turn in before opening the bat-face and playing a deft little late cut
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run moves forward to push it down to long-on for a single
Hauritz to Kallis, 2 runs really well up to the bat, around the off stump, Kallis opens the bat-face and plays a neat square drive through point region
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run Kallis moves across like AB and pinches a single with a wristy shot past midwicket
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run flighted off break outside off stump, driven to deep cover for a single . Two off spinners in action now.
Hussey to de Villiers, no run quicker one, pushed to the on side of the pitch
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run dipping full outside off stump, driven to left of long-on for a single
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run gets forward to square drive it to right of backward point
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run full and outside off, driven down to long-on again for yet another single
Hussey to Kallis, no run flatter, just down leg side, tickled straight to short fine-leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run dipping delivery on the middle, AB is on the off stump line, stumbles a bit as he turns it to short fine-leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, 2 runs leans forward to loft it wide of long-on for couple of runs
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run on the off and middle line, driven to right of the bowler who makes a diving stop
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run quicker, full again, pushed to the on side.
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run goes right back and across to work a delivery from outside off to deep backward square leg region
Hauritz to Kallis, no run floated full outside off, driven to extra cover
Hussey to de Villiers, no run quick and full, on the off and middle, pushed back to David
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run similar delivery, this time AB wrists it to deep midwicket
Hussey to Kallis, no run really full, on the middle, Kallis on drives and David makes a diving stop to his right
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run leans across to drive to sweeper cover where Michael Hussey stops
Hussey to de Villiers, no run flicks it from around off to the on side but can't beat midwicket
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run full, quickish, flat, driven down to long-on
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run shout for lbw but Rudi is not interested. It was flighted full on the off stump line, AB got across and went for the sweep and was perhaps struck just outside off
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run worked through the on side for a run
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run pushes this to cover point for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run moves forward to ping long-on
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run slower, turning in towards off stump, tapped to left of backward point and brings up the 100
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run coming in ever so slowly of this sluggish track, defended to the off side
Hussey to Kallis, 2 runs backs away to play a feisty cut shot but Michael moves quickly to his right at deep cover to cut it off
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run fuller, pushed through the off-side for a single
Hussey to de Villiers, 2 runs flat and quick, on the middle, deflected past square leg and they run hard to come back for the second
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run on the middle and leg, turned to deep backward square leg

Hussey to Kallis, FOUR runs almost yorker length on the off and middle, Kallis gets his bat down in a hurry and some how, manages to open the bat face to squeeze it to third man. Very good ball and even better adjusted by the batsman.
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run retains the strike with a dab shot through off side
Bracken to Kallis, no run Haddin is standing up to the stumps. The 113.3 kmph off cutter, bouncing in from outside leg stump, defended to the on side of the pitch
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run fuller, on the off and middle line, Kallis stays adjacent to the line and drives to deep cover. 50 up and the crowd clear their throat.
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run stays back to punch another off cutter through to deep cover
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run fuller, around 114 k, on the off and middle, driven to long-off
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run goes back to punch a 119 k length delivery to long-off
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run another slow delivery, full, Kallis eases it to long-off
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run pitches on the stumps and he turns it wide of midwicket for one
Hussey to de Villiers, FOUR runs there's a shot! de Villiers uses his feet and swings it over midwicket, picking the gap nicely between two men in the deep
Hussey to de Villiers, no run quicker, flatter, straighter and driven back down the track
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run again he uses his feet and clips it uppishly past midwicket
Hussey to Kallis, 1 run tossed up outside off stump and Kallis pushes into the covers
Hussey to de Villiers, no run a bit of room and he goes back and slaps it into the off side
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run pitches back of a length on middle and leg and whipped away
Johnson to de Villiers, no run a touch shorter outside off and de Villiers defends it to cover
Johnson to de Villiers, 2 runs back of a length on off, he shuffles nicely and turns it past square
Johnson to de Villiers, no run very full and wide, he reaches out to slice it but loses balance, anyway its decently placed but a diving point cuts off the single really well
Johnson to de Villiers, no run walks right across the sticks and tries to clip a fuller ball away from outside off stump but cannot find the gap

Johnson to de Villiers, 2 runs bangs in a short ball, he latches onto it from outside off stump but pulls it into the ground in front of midwicket, some good fast running gets them two off the last ball
Bracken to Kallis, no run pitches fullish on the stumps and defended to the on side
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run angles wide off a shortish length and he opens the face at the last second to dab it down to third man for a single, smart batting to keep the singles ticking over
Bracken to de Villiers, 2 runs leans into a fullish delivery and drives handsomely to extra cover, where a dive cannot cut off the run
Bracken to de Villiers, no run pitches full again, onto the front foot and driven to cover
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run pitches on off stump and he drives it straight down the ground
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run again smartly executed by Kallis, opening the face to steer a slower ball down to third man for a single. It was 109 kmph.
Johnson to Kallis, no run on the off stump line, shuffles across, tries to work it through midwicket but can only get it back to the bowler
Johnson to Kallis, 2 runs on the off stump line, punched to right of third man for couple of runs
Johnson to Kallis, no run moves outside leg, Johnson round-arms a full delivery outside off and Kallis tries to reach out but can't connect
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run just outside off, full, driven down to deep cover
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run slightly short in length, dabbed down to cover point
Johnson to Kallis, no run well outside off, full, 142.4 kmph, Kallis attempts the big cover drive but makes no connection
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run short in length, pulled away but straight to deep backward square leg
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run short in length and outside off, mistimes the cut, edges it close to the off side and they pinch a single
Hopes to de Villiers, no run fuller, around off stump, the ball stops on this slow track and AB checks his drive and the ball is in the air but falls short of cover
Hopes to de Villiers, FOUR runs Thump! It was a touch short in length, coming in from outside off, AB pulls it off the front foot and gets it past Ponting at midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run pushes this through the off side for a single
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run length delivery around off stump, punched to wide mid-off for yet another single
Geeves to Kallis, 1 run 128 kph length delivery outside off stump, Kallis opens the bat-face and dabs it to third man
Geeves to de Villiers, no run slightly short in length, cuts hard but can''t beat Clarke at backward point
Geeves to de Villiers, 1 leg bye beaten by the slower one. It bounces in , AB goes for his signature short-arm pull ,misses and it goes off his thigh pad, bounces before Haddin who fumbles
Geeves to Kallis, (no ball) 1 run fuller, around off stump, square driven to deep point. Free hit coming up
Geeves to de Villiers, 2 runs The slower one, full and just outside off, AB goes down on a bent back knee and ends up slicing it high towards long-on who allows it to bounce in front before throwing
Geeves to de Villiers, 1 run driven through the on side for a single and that's his 50. The crowd show their appreciation for this skillful knock on a very sluggish track
Geeves to Kallis, 1 run pushes to the on side and gets across for a quick single, there is a direct hit but he is home
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run on the off stump line, Kallis chops it to short third man region for a single
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run full in length, on the middle, driven down to long-on for a single
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run just outside off, shaping in, Kallis waits, opens the bat-face and late cuts it down to third man
Hopes to de Villiers, 2 runs charges out, Hopes cuts this one back in from short of length towards the middle stump, AB manages to chop it down to wide third man region
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run cutting into middle and leg line, around 128 kph, jabbed away to square leg
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run moves towards the offside, gets outside the line almost and flicks the ball from middle stump to deep square leg
Geeves to Kallis, no run fires in a bouncer on the middle stump line, Kallis was looking to step down the track and sways away from the line
Geeves to Kallis, 1 run drops the ball close on the off side, one look at each other and off they scamper across for a run
Geeves to de Villiers, 1 run short in length, cutting into middle, that short-arm pull powered by the bottom hand again fetches him a single
Geeves to Kallis, 1 run just outside off stump, placed close to the off side, towards gully for a single and Clarke can't prevent another single
Geeves to de Villiers, 1 run fuller, on the middle stump line, driven down to long-on for a single
Geeves to Kallis, OUT Kallis falls after a fine innings. It was banged in short outside off stump, Kallis goes for the pull but hits it straight to midwicket!
Hopes to de Villiers, 2 runs full pitched outside off stump and AB square drives it past the diving Clarke for couple of runs
Hopes to de Villiers, 2 runs full again but drifting towards the pads, wristed away for another couple of runs, this time behind square leg
Hopes to de Villiers, no run beaten outside off .. It straightened off the good length, de Villiers tried to punch a cover drive on the up but pushed inside the line

Hopes to de Villiers, FOUR runs full in length, just outside off stump, de Villiers eases forward to play a lovely on-the-up drive to left of mid-off where much to the astonishment of the all the Aussie fielders, Bracken doesn't put in a dive and there is no stopping that
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run lapped around the corner on the leg side for a single

Hopes to Duminy, no run the home boy was almost run out first ball. It was punched to cover where Ponting misfielded and the ball rolled to his right. Duminy hared down the track, AB sent him back and the throw isn't great and Duminy rushes back in time
Geeves to de Villiers, no run leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
Geeves to de Villiers, 1 run short in length, 124.8 k, AB is early with his pull shot and squeezes it to long leg for a single
Geeves to Duminy, no run full in length, around off stump line, defended to the off side
Geeves to Duminy, no run leans forward to drive to mid-off
Geeves to Duminy, no run gets behind the line of a length delivery around off stump and defends to the off side
Geeves to Duminy, 1 run shorter in length, tapped towards mid-on and they scamper across for the single
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run full and on the off stump line, Duminy doesn't move forward or back, just bends his knees to hold balance and guides the ball down to third man

Hopes to de Villiers, FOUR runs Edges past the diving Haddin. It was the slower one, full outside off, AB went for the big off drive and edges it through the vacant slip region. Haddin really went full stretch there but couldn't reach
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run worked through the on side for a single
Hopes to Duminy, no run floated across full, around off, driven to left of cover where Ponting makes a tumbling stop
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run full in length, outside off stump, driven to deep cover
Hopes to de Villiers, FOUR runs Crunch! It was back-of-length delivery outside off and AB moved across to flay it through extra cover.
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run paddles the ball from the off stump line to fine leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run yorker length, but drifting down leg, rolls off the boot to the on side. Oh there must have been edge, Rudi gives it away as runs ..
Hauritz to Duminy, 2 runs again that paddle shot to fine leg and he comes back for the second run
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run And Duminy eases this to right of cover for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, FOUR runs Edges through vacant slip region. It was full, quickish, and just outside off, AB tries to drive it through extra cover but gets a nice little fat edge
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run slows up the pace, tosses it outside off, de Villiers goes for the big sweep ,misses and is struck outside off
Johnson to Duminy, 1 leg bye fires it in full and drifting to the pads, Duminy tries to flick it away, misses as the ball curves in more than he thinks and it rolls off the pad to fine leg

Johnson to de Villiers, 1 leg bye de Villiers moves outside leg, Mitch tries to follow him and serves a short of length delivery on the hips, AB tries to get the short-arm-pull going but misses and it rolls off the thigh pad
Johnson to Duminy, 1 run leans forward to flick to midwicket, Hauritz with the throw but doesn't find the stumps at the striker's end

Johnson to de Villiers, OUT It was a length delivery on the middle and leg and it stops on AB who checks his across-the-line waft but gets a leading edge - a simple dolly- to mid-off. Fine innings from AB, who paced this one really well.
Johnson to Duminy, 2 runs a inswinging yorker but slipping to the pads as a result and Duminy flicks it to deep backward square leg
Johnson to Duminy, no run runs away off the pad to short fine leg, Duminy thought he can sneak a run but was sent back, wisely, by his partner. Ponting throws down the stumps.
Hauritz to Morkel, no run from round the stumps, on the off stump line, driven to cover
Hauritz to Morkel, no run Ponting reckons Albie might not be so fluent against a spinner on a slow track. This one is on the off and middle, pushed to the off side
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run pushes this through flatter, on the leg and middle, worked past square leg for a single
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run drifting in towards leg stump, Duminy stays outside leg and pushes it to the off side for a single
Hauritz to Morkel, no run full and on the middle, driven back to Hauritz
Hauritz to Morkel, no run full again, right up there, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler. Fine over this from Hauritz.
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run low full toss on the leg and middle, flicked straight to deep square leg
Hopes to Morkel, 1 run leans forward to push a slower one - around 115 k- to cover for a single
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run Duminy clears the front foot and goes for the big swing to the leg side
Hopes to Morkel, 1 run full and straight, driven to left of Hauritz at long-on for a single
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run The good ol' slog is out but Duminy can't get any meat on it.. it rolls to square leg off the edge
Hopes to Morkel, 1 run flicked past square leg for a single ...
Geeves to Morkel, 1 run short in length, around middle and leg, worked to backward square leg
Geeves to Duminy, 1 run almost caught by the diving Michael Clarke at long-on. It was swung towards long-on
Geeves to Morkel, 1 wide bangs in a high bouncer. Wide called and the crowd roar
Geeves to Morkel, 1 run full in length, outside leg, Albie is further down leg, has a big swing but is too early with the shot on this track and the ball bounds away off the pad to the off side
Geeves to Duminy, SIX runs similar delivery, Duminy clears the front foot, lunges out to bottom-hand it high over square leg. He got the timing right, there.

Geeves to Duminy, (no ball) FOUR runs oh the above waist-high full toss on the off stump line, Duminy goes for the pull and it flies off the edge over the keeper. Ponting rushes to have a chat with the umpire. It was indeed a high full toss
Geeves to Duminy, 2 runs dropped by Ferguson at long-off clears the front foot and goes for the big drive down the ground and Ferguson runs in from long-off, lunges out but drops the catch.
Geeves to Duminy, 1 run driven through the off side for a single. The action-packed over comes to an end. Swing over square -leg, a high full toss edged over keeper and a drop catch near the boundary

Johnson to Duminy, FOUR runs Wow! Duminy, would you believe it, has paddle scooped Mitch! It was a length delivery around off stump, Duminy paddles it over the short fine-leg fielder! Mitchell is not impressed and has a few words to say
Johnson to Duminy, OUT moves outside leg stump and flays a short-of-length delivery but crashes it straight to cover! Mitchell roars. Duminy falls after a 26-ball 32
Johnson to Boucher, 1 run
Johnson to Morkel, 1 leg bye full in length, outside leg stump, tries to swing it to the on side and it rolls away off the pad to the off side
Johnson to Boucher, no run
Johnson to Boucher, 1 run leans forward to drive to mid-off for a single
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run from round the stumps, 112.7 kmph, full length delivery on the off and middle, pushed through cover point

Bracken to Morkel, 1 run fullish, outside off, from over the wicket, around 125 km, Albie is yet to find his mojo on this slow track, is again early with his swing and the ball rolls off the edge to square leg
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run leans across to punch the length delivery to deep cover
Bracken to Morkel, no run well up, outside the off stump, Albie tries to chop it away but doesn't make contact
Bracken to Morkel, 1 wide wide outside off stump this time and Rudi extends his arms
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run 127.7 kph, low dipping full toss, Albie makes contact with the bottom half of the bat and gets just a single down to long-on
Bracken to Boucher, no run from round the stumps , around 113 km, full length delivery, Boucher waits and drives well but straight to cover.

Geeves to Morkel, FOUR runs What a fine short-arm-pull! It was slightly short in length, on the leg and middle line, Albie lifted his front leg in the air as he shifted his weight to his back foot and pulled it to deep backward square leg boundary
Geeves to Morkel, 1 run fuller in length, pushed across Albie who mistimes the across-the-line drag to mid-on for a single
Geeves to Boucher, 1 run well outside the off stump, Boucher reaches out to drive to right of cover, deflected to long-off
Geeves to Morkel, no run the slower one , around 117 k, very full and outside off, Albie checks his shot, tries to get bat on ball but doesn't
Geeves to Morkel, 2 runs 133 k yorker outside off, Albie backs away to chop it to left of third man for couple of runs
Geeves to Morkel, 1 run Another really well up delivery outside off, again Albie chops it away to wide third man region
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run full delivery outside off stump, driven really hard to long-off

Bracken to Boucher, FOUR runs from round the stumps to the right-handed Boucher - third man and fine-leg up in the circle- and Bracken pushes it outside leg and Boucher laps it around the corner to deep backward square leg boundary.

Bracken to Boucher, SIX runs clears the front foot and kills a length delivery on the off stump line high and just over long-on. It went high up in the air, Clarke was interested till the last moment but it dipped over him in the end
Bracken to Boucher, 2 runs short of blockhole, driven hard down the pitch, Bracken deflects it off his right leg and they run hard to come back for the second run
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run driven through mid-off for a single
Bracken to Morkel, SIX runs Thwack! A six on a bent back knee! It was the low full toss outside off and Albie went down on his back knee and creamed it high over long-off.
Hopes to Boucher, SIX runs He has killed it. Brutal. It was full delivery outside off and Boucher hammers it over long-on. The crowd go mad.
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run drags this length delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
Hopes to Morkel, 1 run fullish, on the middle and leg, swung to the deep midwicket region where Ponting makes the stop
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run slower one, short in length outside off, Boucher is made to wait and he pulls it down to deep midwicket
Hopes to Morkel, 1 run on the leg and middle, swung away to deep square leg region
Hopes to Boucher, 2 runs clears the front foot and drags the slower one from outside off to deep backward square leg

bracken has proven himself as a state player and the best odi bowler in the world and he was taken for 20 in an over by albie and boucher in blistering form. hopes is a batting all rounder thus, he needs to make some runs when it is hes turn or it will be a bad game. geeves is a good state player at best, dirk nannes is a

On a sluggish track, South Africa paced the innings really well. Early on, the batsman were going a tad early through the shot but slowly they settled down. Kallis and AB, with contrasting approaches, gave the innings momentum. Kallis stayed adjacent to the line and punched through the off side where as AB shuffled to the
No great movement so far but the ball is skidding on faster to the bat under lights

Steyn to Haddin, no run 139.2 kmph length delivery outside off stump, left alone

Steyn to Clarke, 1 run another slower one, full and on the middle, leans across to tap it to right of midwicket for a single.. Haddin is looking edgy, wanting to up the run rate but the bowling has been tight so far.
Parnell to Clarke, no run stands up tall to push it to the off side. Aus need 262 runs more

Parnell to Clarke, 1 run again mistimes another on drive as he keeps pushing that front leg too much across and then has to get his bat around the front pad. In all that movement, the timing goes for a toss.

Parnell to Ponting, no run dropped by Boucher. Parnell to Ferguson, 1 run shifts outside leg stump, follows him with a full delivery, whipped to deep midwicket region and that's his fifty. The crowd applaud and his team-mates too celebrate. The batsmen get together in the middle.
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run driven through the off side for a single
van der Merwe to Hopes, 2 runs floated full around off stump, lunges out to loft over the on side but gets a leading edge over cover
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run tries to sweep from outside off, misses and Boucher whips off the bails
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run slows up the pace, he is too early with the sweep shot and bottom edges it to his pad and it rolls away the off side
van der Merwe to Ferguson, 1 run quicker, short in length, skidding in, tucked past midwicket
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run played away toward deep midwicket for another single
van der Merwe to Ferguson, 1 run floated full on the middle, tries to go for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect as well he would have like
Botha to Ferguson, FOUR runs moves outside leg and lifts it over extra cover. What a cracking start. Do we have a twist in the tale?
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run gets forward to drive to long-off for a single
Botha to Hopes, 1 run sweeps to deep backward square leg for a single
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run skips down the track, loopy delivery dips rapidly, dragged to short fine leg
Botha to Hopes, 1 run leans forward to drive to long-on
Botha to Ferguson, FOUR runs full delivery on the middle and Ferguson goes down town. Fierce heave and he will pick up another boundary.
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run drives to Steyn at long-on for a single
van der Merwe to Ferguson, 1 run moves outside leg stump, fires it in full, dug out to the on side for a single
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run skips down the track, short in length and skidding on, tries to clip it away but it rolls of his pad to the off side
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run stretches forward to ping long-on
van der Merwe to Ferguson, 2 leg byes almost cleaned up. He went for the reverse sweep, fails to get bat on ball but it runs past the off stump and to fine-leg as Boucher doesn't collect
Botha to Johnson, 1 run leans forward to drive through to long-off
Botha to Hopes, 1 run leans forward to dig the full delivery towards midwicket for a very quick single
Botha to Johnson, SIX runs Mitch waltzes down the track and lifts it high over long-off for a six. He has been left with too much to do here, though.
Botha to Johnson, no run fires it in quick and is struck on the pad
Botha to Johnson, no run pushes that one through quick, full, jabbed out to the off side
Botha to Johnson, 5 wide slips in well down the leg side and Boucher can't get across in time
Botha to Johnson, 1 run swung to deep midwicket for a single

Morkel to Johnson, 1 run, OUT short in length, outside off stump, punched through cover point and Mitchell runs back for the second run. The throw, fast and accurate, comes in from Duminy from the deep and Boucher breaks the stumps. They go the third umpire. OUT!
Morkel to Geeves, no run full in length outside off stump, punched out to cover
Morkel to Geeves, FOUR runs short in length, just outside off stump, stays adjacent to the line and forces it to deep backward point boundary
Morkel to Geeves, 1 leg bye shout for lbw but the point of impact was outside off stump. He leaned forward to drive through the on side and the yorker hit his boot just outside off
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run almost at the blockhole, pushed down to long-on for a single
Morkel to Geeves, 2 runs low full toss on the off stump, swatted to left of long-on where Steyn rushes across but stumbles as he makes the stop
Parnell to Hopes, FOUR runs full pitched on the legs, Hopes brings up his fifty with a drag-flick to deep backward square leg boundary. The fine leg was in the circle
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run full pitched around off, driven to deep cover for a single
Parnell to Geeves, 1 leg bye tries to swing it to the on side and it rolls away off the pad
Parnell to Hopes, FOUR runs That good old inside edge to fine-leg . Really full delivery, the bat comes down in an angle and the ball flies past the leg stump
Parnell to Hopes, 2 runs backs away to give himself some room and lifts it high over extra cover
Parnell to Hopes, no run fullish, driven back down the track
Steyn to Geeves, 1 run short in length, a flat-batted , forehand shot to the off side ..
Steyn to Hopes, no run moves outside leg, Steyn fires in a yorker outside leg, dug out to the off side
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run slower one, tries to swing it away, misses and it rolls off the body to the on side
Steyn to Geeves, 1 run banged in short, Geeves goes for the flat-batted forehand cross court to long-on ... and smiles ..
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run slower one, full, leans forward to push it through the on side ..250 up
Steyn to Geeves, 2 runs low full toss on the leg and middle, gets it wide of long-on for couple of runs. Just one more over left.
Parnell to Hopes, no run fullish outside off stump, sliced to backward point
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run full again, gets it down to long-off, Mitchell had turned for the second but Hopes sends him back and he gets back just in time
Parnell to Geeves, 4 byes big swing and a miss. But Boucher also fails to stop the slower one that bounces before him and runs through ...
Parnell to Geeves, 4 leg byes another across-the-line swipe, misses it and it bounds away off the thigh pad through the vacant slip region
Parnell to Geeves, 1 bye lovely slower one outside off, Geeves is through with the shot too early and Boucher collects
Parnell to Hopes, 2 runs full pitched on the stumps, driven to long-off for couple of runs .. And South Africa win by 25 runs. They take the lead in the series.
That's it from us. Thanks for logging on. Good bye and good luck.

The players shake hands with each other and walk off. The crowd slowly start to clear away. Australia got off to a slow start in the chase with their openers Haddin and Clarke suffocated by some tight bowling from Steyn and Parnell. Then the spinners took over on this dry track and Australia lost their way further. Fergus
South Africa won by 25 runs
Player of the match is Jacques Kallis, SA
